channel.title: Wowiliketocode help
channel.description: I'm sorry I don't really no what I'm doing. I'm kinda new to coding. I'm not gonna leech I'm gonna change quite a bit around. Ur servers great btw. One question. Do I need to get a vps or will no-ip work with firewall off? And if I need a vps can u explain how to get one

item.title: Wowiliketocode help
item.dc:creator: @wemissedu wemissedu
item.description:
@wemissedu wrote:

I don’t know how to allow just that port past firewall. It says I did unblock it from
Firewall but it won’t work. Will disabling my firewall make me very susceptible to hack

Read full topic

item.title: Wowiliketocode help
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

[quote=“wemissedu, post:4, topic:438040”]But can I run the sever without a vps of I turn my firewall off and use my
No-ip? Or is the vps required? And what do they actually do that benefits over no-ip?[/quote]
Sure just turn off your firewall and open up all your ports so anyone can hack you… -.-

What you want to do is portforward so only one port is open, allow that port past the firewall, then just use no ip (Masks your ip) in place of your main/Broadcasted IP. Way more safe this way.

Read full topic
